name: ARIA for Medicaid Eligibility Verification
description: Automate patient Medicaid eligibility verification for any state. Reduce processing time by 95% and eliminate manual errors with ARIA.

name: Automated Cash Application
description: Automate 70%+ of your cash application process with real-time matching, intelligent exception handling, and seamless ERP integration that turns hours of manual work into minutes.

name: Automated Factoring Execution
description: Transform your factoring business with intelligent automation that streamlines invoice processing, minimizes fraud risk, and automates 70% of operations.

name: Automated Invoice Processing
description: AI-powered invoice automation that eliminates manual data entry and accelerates AP processing with 75% time savings and intelligent validation across all document formats.

name: Automated Purchase Order Processing
description: ARIA for Purchase Orders is an intelligent digital assistant that extracts data from any sales order format to automate ERP entry, reducing processing time by 72%.

name: Automated WERCS Compliance
description: Automate WERCS registration with intelligent data extraction and RPA to ensure accuracy, speed up product launches, and reduce manual effort by 70%.

name: Intelligent Lemon Law Automation
description: Automate lemon law intake and case management with AI chatbots, instant VIN analysis, and automated workflows to win more cases without adding staff.

name: Intelligent Production Scheduling Optimization
description: AI solves multi-variable optimization across factory constraints in real-time to maximize throughput and minimize changeover costs.

name: Predictive Demand Forecasting
description: AI-driven demand forecasting that ingests market signals to automate production planning, reducing inventory costs and preventing stockouts.

name: Predictive Maintenance for Packaging
description: AI models monitor machine telemetry to detect early failure patterns, automating work orders and preventing costly production line stoppages.
